alert.note: Alert for White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 1:15PM CST until March 05 at 8:50PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Little Red River At Judsonia affecting White County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Red River At Judsonia. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Minor flooding, farmland along the right descending bank floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 24.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late Friday morning, and continue to rise to 31.5 feet early Saturday morning, March 4th. It will then fall below flood stage early that afternoon. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 12 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Crest Time Date Little Red River Judsonia 30.0 24.7 Thu 12 PM 30.5 30.8 26.5 31.5 12 AM 3/04 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
